topic.title: IXF to CSV conversion

body.p: A new utility, IXF2CSV, enables you to convert an existing IXF case into an input deck consisting of CSV files with many frequently used fields. CSV files are easier to modify using external tools such as Microsoft Excel.

For further information, in the INTERSECT User Guide refer to Automatic IXF to CSV generation workflow in Appendix 7 for a full list of supported IXF parameters and nodes and the Using the Automatic IXF2CSV generation workflow example to see the utility in use.
